F2CWrapper.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /* 
00002  * File: F2CWrapper.h
00003  * -----------------
00004  * Wrappers to some fortran functions (everything must be passed by pointer)
00005  * 1) LAPACK direct solvers (full and band)
00006  * 2) Blitzpak iterative solver (sparse)
00007  * 3) Algebraic multigrid (AMG) solver (sparse)
00008  *
00009  * ------------------------------------------ 
00010  * Created      01/30/99        Huic 
00011  *
00012  */
00013 #ifndef F2CWrapper_H_
00014 #define F2CWrapper_H_
00015 
00016 #include "../Main/sysMicrosDef.h"
00017 #ifdef SYS_UNIX_LINUX
00018 #define F2C_C_STDCALL void
00019 #else
00020 #define F2C_C_STDCALL void __stdcall
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 #define dgesv DGESV                                                                                             // LAPACK full solver
00024 #define dgbsv DGBSV                                                                                             // LAPACK band solver   
00025 //#define amg   AUX1R5                                                                                  // AMG sparse matrix solver                                                     
00026 
00027 #define bpkbound bpkbound_                                                              // blitzpak storeage estimation routine
00028 #define ibltzpk  ibltzpk_                                                                       // blitzpak initialization routine
00029 #define blitzpak blitzpak_                                                              // blitzpak solve routine
00030 
00031 
00032 // --- LAPACK Solver ------------------
00033 extern "C" 
00034 {
00035 #ifdef SYS_UNIX_LINUX
00036   //added underscore to function names. Erlend Oian
00037   void  dgesv_(int *N, int *NRHS, double *A, int *LDA,
00038               int *IPIV, double *B, int *LDB, int *INFO );
00039   void dgbsv_(int *N, int *KL, int *KU, int *NRHS, double *A, int *LDA,
00040               int *IPIV, double *B, int *LDB, int *INFO );
00041 #else
00042         void  dgesv(int *N, int *NRHS, double *A, int *LDA,
00043               int *IPIV, double *B, int *LDB, int *INFO );
00044         void dgbsv(int *N, int *KL, int *KU, int *NRHS, double *A, int *LDA,
00045               int *IPIV, double *B, int *LDB, int *INFO );
00046 #endif
00047 }
00048 
00049 void DGESV_C(int n, int nRHS, double *a, int lda, int *ipiv, 
00050               double *b, int ldb);
00051 void DGBSV_C(int n, int kl, int ku, int nRHS, double *a, int lda, int *ipiv, 
00052               double *b, int ldb);

00055 // --- AMG Solver ------------------
00056 extern "C" 
00057 {
00058 #ifdef SYS_UNIX_LINUX
00059         // Changed function name from 'AUX1R5' to 'aux1r5_' such that the fortran subroutine can
00060         // be found. Erlend Oian.
00061         F2C_C_STDCALL  aux1r5_(double *A, int *iA, int *jA, double *X, double *B, int *iw,
00062                 int *nDA, int *nDIA, int *nDJA, int *nDX, int *nDB, int *nDIW,
00063                 int *nA, int *matrix, double *eps, int *iFirst, int *iSwitch,
00064                 int *iOut, int *iPrint, int *iErr);
00065         //this is full AMG function
00066         // Changed function name from 'AMG1R5_1990' to 'amg1r5_' such that the fortran subroutine can
00067         // be referenced. problems due to lacking underscore and probably too long name. Erlend Oian.
00068         F2C_C_STDCALL  amg1r5_(double *A, int *iA, int *jA, double *X, double *B, int *iw,
00069                 int *nDA, int *nDIA, int *nDJA, int *nDX, int *nDB, int *nDIW,
00070                 int *nA, int *matrix, int *iSwitch, int *iOut, int *iPrint,int *levelx,
00071                 int *iFirst, int *nCYC,double *eps, int *mADAPT, int *nRD, int *nSOLCO,
00072                 int *nRU, double *ECG1, double *ECG2, double *EWT2, int *nWT, int *nTR,
00073                 int *iErr);
00074 #else
00075         F2C_C_STDCALL  AUX1R5(double *A, int *iA, int *jA, double *X, double *B, int *iw,
00076                 int *nDA, int *nDIA, int *nDJA, int *nDX, int *nDB, int *nDIW,
00077                 int *nA, int *matrix, double *eps, int *iFirst, int *iSwitch,
00078                 int *iOut, int *iPrint, int *iErr);
00079         //this is full AMG function
00080         F2C_C_STDCALL  AMG1R5_1990(double *A, int *iA, int *jA, double *X, double *B, int *iw,
00081                 int *nDA, int *nDIA, int *nDJA, int *nDX, int *nDB, int *nDIW,
00082                 int *nA, int *matrix, int *iSwitch, int *iOut, int *iPrint,int *levelx,
00083                 int *iFirst, int *nCYC,double *eps, int *mADAPT, int *nRD, int *nSOLCO,
00084                 int *nRU, double *ECG1, double *ECG2, double *EWT2, int *nWT, int *nTR,
00085                 int *iErr);
00086 #endif
00087 }
